TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MetadataWorkspace extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 ADO.NET 元数据运行时服务组件，该组件可为从各种源检索元数据提供支持。

span.span: Represents the ADO.NET metadata runtime service component that provides support for retrieving metadata from various sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一个中心运行时服务组件，可用于在给定应用程序的上下文中与概念模型元数据进行交互。The class provides a central runtime service component that you can use to interact with conceptual model metadata in the context of a given application.
